name: Battle City 3
description:
Battle city 3 — is a huge world of labyrinths and a terrifying number of enemies that await at every turn.

Navigate with 5 standard buttons in the functionality, collect gold coins and earn experience without wasting your own attempts. Many mines will be placed in front of you, and enemy tanks will be able to pass among them, which will try to shoot you for your defeat. Find the necessary doors and enter them, but before that, take all the available resources.
